entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Individual test failures may not always be surfaced as a failure in the test run summary. #90905
  • [API Proposal]: Add an interface to unify property/field access #90901
  • Add Option to Build Runtime Tests (src/tests/build.sh) Using Official Crossgen2 Bits #90900
    9.0.0
  • Performance regression, memory usage #90899
  • NegotiateAuthentication larger code size and also brings in BigInteger #90898
  • C# lock has a dead branch in codegen #90896
  • JIT-EE: Annotate APIs as Invariant/Non-invariant #90886
    Future
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should provide an info message when arrays don't have any [In] or [Out] attributes #90884
    8.0.0
  • Add docs for porting dotnet to a new OS/arch/libc #90883
    9.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator docs should be very clear about changed in marshalling behavior between built in COM #90876
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Functional.Tests timeout in CI #90874
    9.0.0
  • Crash/Unhandled exception with .net runtime upgrade. #90869
  • Should RegisteredWaitHandle always use Win32 TP? #90866

Closed

  • ContainsGenericParameters not reported for function pointer types #84916
    9.0.0
  • JIT test GenericCatchInterfaceProgram fails in Checked NativeAOT #90848
    9.0.0
  • Setting max worker threads of ThreadPool neither work nor fail #80072
    8.0.0
  • "Make member readonly" is offered even in cases where it changes behavior #90897
  • Port System.Runtime.InteropServices documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88573
    8.0.0
  • StringBuilder.AppendInterpolatedStringHandler breaks backwards compatibility and violates order-of-execution expectations #90885
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/generics/regressions/DD117522/Test/Test.sh #89545
    8.0.0
  • clr build is failing on machine with large number of cores #90879
  • FileSystemWatcher fails to trigger a file or Dir with a single char #46727
    Future
  • .net8.0.0-preview.7.23375.6, nativeaot, [Serializable] feature does not work #90860
  • [8.0] Unknown error (0xc0000001) from CngCommon.SignVerify in X509Certificates.Tests.PfxFormatTests_Collection.OneCert_TwoKeys_FirstWins #90877
    8.0.0
  • Ensure localization changes are ported to release/8.0 #90755
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator Unmanaged to Manage call doesn't update the unmanaged pointer #90868
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.MemoryStream: ReadByte() and WriteByte() can throw IndexOutOfRangeException #88541
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite failing #86262
    8.0.0
  • get attributes from objects created on runtime #90164
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Failing arm64 LLVM FullAOT tests #64179
    9.0.0
  • [Android][Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async.AllSocketsHttpHandlerCounters_Success_Recorded #89237
    9.0.0
  • [browser] loadBootResource should not ask for `dotnetwasm` location before cache lookup #89883
    8.0.0
  • dotnet/cecil links to cecil.pe which is an unrelated website #90865

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Add a dependency on dotnet/installer to get the latest #90904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix typo in documentation comments #90903
    area-System.Threading
  • Only initialize listeners once #90902
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Enable rule CA1869 - Cache and reuse 'JsonSerializerOptions' #90895
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Adding missing System.Buffers documentation #90891
    needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT] Missing memory fence before bulk move of objects #90890
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add chrome versions to PR title, and labels #90889
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix SPMI issue in getHelperFtn #90888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Fix queue count in rate limiters #90878
    area-System.Threading
  • [mono][wip] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #90875
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #90871
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add a test case for copy propagation #90870
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Reverted the change in IsInstanceOfException #90867
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Type.ContainsGenericParameters for function pointers #90864
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix incomplete type errors when debugging in lldb/gdb (#90791) #90873
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Add missing space in yaml #90894
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add missing space in yaml #90893
    needs-area-label
  • Adding PACKAGE.md to System.Runtime.Caching package #90701
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Fix Position and Seek for MemoryStream with custom origin #88572
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix queue count in rate limiters #90810
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/8.0] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/8.0 #90813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [main] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/8.0 temporarily #90812
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90819
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome version used for testing #90823
    arch-wasm
  • Update Package readme guidelines with new template #90842
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add Retry and Task.Delay to WinHttpHandler AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite test #90824
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] Events for IL methods without IL headers #90844
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Initialize module's image ALC for dynamic objects #90731
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update Fedora docker image to Fedora 38 #90776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Notify jiterpreter when a method is freed #89980
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Enable Yield_r* tests with full-AOT (llvm) #90614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors after the kernel supporting SIMD. #90734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

Updated

  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Made threadstatic helper call sites slightly simpler (static ctor case) #90641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make DacValidateMD and DacValidateMethodTable more resilient #90794
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Just running tests with new EH enabled on all platforms #90790
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90796
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix dupe word typos. #88047
    area-Meta, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Mono Interpreter - Mask AllShift amounts #90666
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Update (remove most) most of CLRTestKind, GenerateRunScript, RestorePackages #89696
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/8.0] Fix config names for CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs #90841
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Limit length of System.Runtime.BigInteger to int.MaxValue-32 bits #84901
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Make member readonly" is offered even in cases where it silently changes behavior #69645
    Backlog
  • IDE0059 is unnecessary in Primary Constructors #69643
    Backlog
  • Ctrl+click preview doesn't work for source generated code #69641
    Backlog
  • "Move type to" code action doesn't open the new document. #69638
    Backlog
  • Convert to binary/hex is suggested even when it makes the code more complex #69637
    Backlog
  • Unable to invoke quick fix for some suggestions #69636
    18.0
  • Collection expressions: inapplicable overloads considered in overload resolution #69634
  • Inconsistent behaviour of source code generators in VS 2022 #69633
  • Incremental Source Generators: Concat Extensionmethod #69632

Closed

  • Extension methods from ASP.NET Core-related packages do not trigger the C# suggested usings feature in VS #64712
    Backlog
  • VSCode and VS 17.7.0 Preview 3.0 reports CA1822 when using Primary Constructor on non-record types #69061
    17.8 P4
  • C# - When jumping to definition in a decompiled or source link file for the first time, the cursor is always at the beginning of file #69514
    17.8 P4
  • [SUGGESTION] Creating Constructor With All Fields Option Not Showing Anymore #69593
    Backlog
  • "Move type to" code action using C# Dev Kit incorrectly moves the type to the root folder. #68550
    Post GA
  • C# compilation performance regression in latest 7.0.400 SDK #69515
    17.8
  • `AddImportsAnnotation` doesn't match existing line endings #65081
    17.5
  • Automatic insertion of missing using directive uses CRLF in LF file if the new directive is the first in the file #62976
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Filter out captured primary constructor parameters from completion lists. #69647
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow collapsing local function definitions if desired by user #69646
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix issue where errant comments were preventing code collapsing #69644
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Find symbols defined in a source-generated compilation in the originating compilation #69642
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make the [Experimental] warning as error by default #69639
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [17.7] Cache substituted base type #69635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Support creating binlogs for the language server's design time builds #69572
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move csharp decompiler service down to features so it is available in vscode #69501
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69504
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69466
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #68418
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update compiler toolset #69640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add EA support so that asp.net can create instances of the 'Add Nuget Package' code fix in a lightbulb. #69586
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets - make `foreach` snippet work with `await` and async enumerables #69538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Cache substituted base type #69605
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not wrap an existing collection that was on one line and is having no items added to it #69624
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Another way to correct generate Uri for new Document when resolve code action #68995
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve EOL consistency for Add Using #69309
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include documentation in MetadataReference creation #69529
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69649
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #69648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix TFM for function pointer expected output tests #69506
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to 8.0 preview 7 ref assemblies in compiler tests #69614
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report misplaced unchecked in cref as warning #69609
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add ctor to Stack Trace Explorer #69630
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Stop descending through tuple when no slot can be created #69513
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Add locals to binder from out vars in array rank specifiers on local functions #69597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Cherry-Pick #69497 #69611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for emitting PrivateImplementationDetails to EnC deltas #69485
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code fluent collection building to a collection expression #69580
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: overload resolution #69594
    New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Make the fallback auto render mode timeout configurable #50250
  • RateLimiter is not working if I use IHost/IHostBuilder #50244
  • WsFederation Wtrealm is required but it is a nullable string on WsFederationOptions #50242
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50241
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50240
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50239
  • EditForm OnSubmit handler not firing #50237
  • Add .NET Standard 2.0 support to Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities #50236
  • SignInManager Namespace Missing on .NET 8 Perview version #50232
  • OutputCache attribute not working when not mapping controllers directly #50226
  • Remove temporary APIs before .NET 8 ships #50225
    8.0
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50220

Closed

  • Perf improvement: mapaction #50207
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #50219
  • dotnet watch tests fail when run locally #43640
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Web App Template NavMenu Component is Missing Render Attribute - Click Events Do Not Get Fired #50028
    8.0-rc2
  • How to publish .net 8 preview 7 blazor wasm AOT to github pages #50215
  • AddIdentityBearerToken should not be generic #49404
    8.0-preview7
  • Missing E2E test case: CanFollowAsynchronousExternalRedirection #50235
    8.0-rc2
  • Support Keyed Services in Minimal APIs #49633
    8.0-rc1
  • Support Keyed Services in MVC #49634
    8.0-rc1
  • Review behavior/rules for inheriting components with a RenderModeAttribute #49848
    8.0-rc2
  • How to get HttpClient BaseAddress in Blazor Server Application from appsetting.json file #50223
  • Debugging Blazor WebAssembly Client project in Visual Studio routes API calls incorrectly #50224
  • General API review for full stack web UI with Blazor #47028
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor route constraint does not work. #49921
    8.0-rc2
  • Provide error message when using WebAssembly render mode but AddWebAssemblyRenderMode() hasn't been called #49305
    8.0-rc2
  • Default Blazor template contains "uncrawlable links" causing SEO score loss on PageSpeed Insights #50196
  • .NET web api stops responding, resulting in 503 errors (IIS) #49992

PullRequests

Created

  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
  • Make MapIdentityApi DTOs public #50247
    area-identity
  • Consume IHostEnvironment.ContentRootFileProvider from CertificatePathWatcher #50246
    area-runtime
  • Resolve interceptor location using identifier name #50245
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #50234
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50222
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update Microsoft.Identity.Model to 7.0.0-preview3 #50218
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update to string_decoder@1.3.0 in repo #50249
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview1
  • Stateful Reconnect API changes #50092
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0-rc1
  • Make Kestrel default to HTTP/1 and /2 #50243
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 8.0-rc1
  • SignInManager.AuthenticationScheme rename #50169
    area-identity, 8.0-rc2
  • Avoid some Logger instantiations per request #50184
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Support Keyed Services in MVC #50145
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, blog-candidate, 8.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7e33b6a` to `f42da0e` #50182
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #50191
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50167
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Improve crawlability of links in default Blazor project templates #50197
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [SignalR] Pass new App to Transport Pipe to App layer #49650
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr
  • Add exclusion for `.vsconfig` file to CI #50203
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Close the circuit when all Blazor Server components are disposed #50170
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2249060 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    blocked, area-runtime, area-routing
  • Persist Prerendered State #50146
    area-blazor
  • [SignalR][TS client] Stateful reconnect #49940
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript
  • API review followups #50181
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Local development build improvements #50205
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add New Event for Customizing Chain Policy Before Certificate Validation #49789
    area-security, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider moving MAUI's Color type into the base .NET #16903
  • Entry is not unfocus when hide or close softkeyboard #16897
  • Toggling IsSpellCheckEnabled and IsTextPredictionEnabled should refresh red squiggly lines #16894
  • MAUI project iOS simulator startup failed MT7091 #16886

Closed

  • Maui (.net 7) Android (apk) Button behaves differently in Debug and Release. #16825
  • Windows TabBar Icons do not use the correct color #16575
    Backlog
  • iOS label within horizontalstacklayout overflowing container #12895
    Backlog
  • Contentpage is cut off in iOS #8778
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .net 8 preview 4 HotRestart prevents launching iOS app #15564
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Memory Leak issue in MAUI #15523
  • ItemsUpdatingScrollMode not working for Windows Platform on .NET 7 MAUI #16887
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] Static extension can't resolve nested class references from class libraries #16293
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] The launch screen of the app is not correct on android and iOS target. #15593
    .NET 8 GA
  • Maui app black screen in ipad (iPadOS 16.4) #14421
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • CarouselView doesn't scroll to the CurrentItem when set #7575
    .NET 8 GA
  • ScrollView.ScrollToAsync(x, y false) returns before scroll is completed (when #7295
    .NET 8 GA
  • WebView Navigating and Navigated Events not fired #14379
  • Translating object which has two parts x and y. Unable to find such option. #16884

PullRequests

Created

  • Fail the build before it even starts #16906
  • [UITest] Get the tabbedpage UI test working #16905
    area/testing
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Updates for dotnet/runtime #16904
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #16902
  • Handlers should not implement `IImageSourcePartSetter` directly #16901
  • Add .NET Foundation license file header #16896
    Under Consideration
  • [WinUI] Update shadow mask as part of shadow properties #16895
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.7.0 #16888
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Set Mapper/Handler ctor to protected on migration handlers #16882
    .NET 8 GA
  • Revert "Make ImageSourcePartExtensions public" #16893
    .NET 8 GA
  • [build] Manage extensions via maestro #16834
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Merge main into net8.0 #16876
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984

  • Add interface to expose out UIView methods #16868

  • Tests: Add support for connected component analysis #16770
